Macaé, RJ

1997–2001 
Universidade do Estado do Rio de Janeiro

Universidade Federal Rural do Rio de Janeiro

▪ Very experienced in presentations, training and learning/development initiatives. 
▪ Applies macro insight on any activity. 
▪ Advanced user or SAP (MM Expert, great knowledge in SD and FI). 
▪ Advanced user of office package (Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Visio).
